subject: Re: Virtual Meeting - Request
preview: Please go ahead.  Regards,    Roman Tepes  Chief Book Balancer  www.balancemybooks.com.au  (m) 0412 233 801

full_threads.body:
Please go ahead.

Regards,



Roman Tepes

Chief Book Balancer

www.balancemybooks.com.au

(m) 0412 233 801

Hi Roman,

No worries - totally understand that.

Regarding improving the estimate journey updates, please find the below scope of work.

Step One: Improve UX experience - 2hrs

Plan of action:

  • Remove banner section

  • Configure multiple choice field with the updated design

  • Add the necessary custom CSS/JS to achieve the mockup


Step Two: Adding Licensed Club Path - 3hrs

Plan of action:

  • Update the estimate form from the given spreadsheet

  • Test and confirm amount and steps


Let me know if you have any questions, or if you're happy to proceed and I can get this prioritised within the team. 🙌

Thanks,


Ava Webster

Project Manager



☎ 1300 072 134

✉ ava@wolfiq.com.au

Hi Ava,

Thank you on the below. Let's leave the captcha as is. I don't like the puzzles; it would detract from genuine humans. .

Regards,



Roman Tepes

Chief Book Balancer

www.balancemybooks.com.au

(m) 0412 233 801

Hi Roman,

Hope you had a fantastic weekend!

Thanks so much for sending this through - I'll get the team to have a look and will come back to you with a quote to implement.

Regarding the other items we discussed:


  • Mobile Speed: we've completed the performance improvements for Balance My Books, specifically focusing on mobile speed. The mobile score has now increased to 91. You can review the updated results here.

  • Reviews: The previous Google Reviews plugin was showing an error due to a Google API issue. Since you're on a care plan, we've replaced it with Elf Insights, which is included in your package. Elf Insights is now active and should correctly display the latest Google reviews moving forward.

  • Spam + Bot Activity: Our team has taken a closer look at the forms, and here's what they found:

    • The submissions coming through aren't being flagged as spam because they appear to be manually submitted or copy-pasted by users, similar to what we occasionally see in our own contact forms.

    • Since these aren't automated bot entries, CleanTalk can't fully block them.

    • To further reduce this noise, we can tighten the protection by switching from Invisible reCAPTCHA to reCAPTCHA v2 (the checkbox/puzzle version).

    • This adds an extra verification step and is more effective at blocking both bots and low-effort manual spam.




Let me know if you'd like us to proceed with the puzzle reCAPTCHA, happy to update it right away.

Thanks,


Ava Webster

Project Manager



☎ 1300 072 134

✉ ava@wolfiq.com.au

Hi Ava,

All below is agreed and I like the visual cubes. Thank you for the quick turn around and attention to detail.

Attached is the spreadsheet and here is a screen shot of the required steps for Clubs.

Regards,



Roman Tepes

Chief Book Balancer

http://www.balancemybooks.com.au/

(m) 0412 233 801

Morning Samantha,

Please find attached a quick mock-up of our recommendations for the estimate journey first page.

Our recommendations:


  • Improve Time-to-Action: Eliminate the large section header to reduce the need for scrolling, allowing users to engage with content immediately upon landing.

  • Enhance Navigation Clarity: Substitute the current dropdown menu with four visual cubes (using icons) to provide clear, easy-to-use navigational options.


Once we've received the spreadsheet with the updated path and pricing details, I can give you a quote to perform the above edits. 🙌

Let me know your thoughts and if you have any questions here too.

Thanks,



Ava Webster

Project Manager



☎ 1300 072 134

✉ ava@wolfiq.com.au

Thanks for your time, Ava.

Look forward to hearing back from you.

Have a good weekend.

Regards,

Samantha

www.balancemybooks.com.au

(t) 1300 319 000 (e) Samantha@balancemybooks.com.au

(a) Level 14, 3 Parramatta Square, 153 Macquarie Street Parramatta NSW 2150

Referrals are a crucial part of our business. If you, your friends, family members, or work colleagues are in need of our comprehensive range of business services, please don't hesitate to contact us. We would be grateful for the opportunity to assist you.

To learn more about our services and how we can help, please visit our website at www.balancemybooks.com.au. We also have a referral partner program that allows you to earn rewards for any successful referrals you make. If you're interested in joining our program, please email us, and we'll set you up. Thank you for your support.

Hi Samantha + Roman,

Thank you very much for your time earlier - lovely to speak and discuss the website.

Just summarising the key items we spoke about:

  • Mobile Speed: The team is currently working on optimising site performance for mobile devices.



  • Estimate Page UX: I have our graphic team creating a quick mockup of recommended user experience improvements and will share it shortly. We are also ready to implement the "Licensed Clubs" new option and all other updates from your spreadsheet-please send that through when ready!



  • Spam/Bots: Our technical team is investigating solutions to immediately crack down on contact form spam.



  • Google Reviews: We are looking into this and will update you ASAP.



Please feel free to reach out to myself or support@foxandlee.com.au if there's anything else you notice, and I'll keep you updated on these items.

Thanks!



Ava Webster

Project Manager



☎ 1300 072 134

✉ ava@wolfiq.com.au

Thanks so much, Allie and Ava.

Have a great day.

Regards,

Samantha

www.balancemybooks.com.au

(t) 1300 319 000 (e) Samantha@balancemybooks.com.au

(a) Level 14, 3 Parramatta Square, 153 Macquarie Street Parramatta NSW 2150

Hi Samantha,

Lovely to meet you.

I'd be happy to have a meeting to run-through these website updates, sounds exciting!

I'm available at 2pm on Thursday, let me send an invite through to yourself and Roman shortly. 🙌

Thanks,


Ava Webster

Project Manager



☎ 1300 072 134

✉ ava@wolfiq.com.au

No problem, Samantha 😊

Got it, looping our project manager, Ava, who will get back to you

Let me know if there's anything else I can do for you, always happy to help

Thank you, Allie.

It'd be good to have a meeting, please.

Regards,

Samantha

Hi Samantha,

Thanks so much for reaching out, it is wonderful to hear from you!

We would love to help you get these changes sorted. If you have the specific details handy, feel free to just pop them into a Google Doc and send it through. We can jump on those changes immediately for you.

However, if you would prefer to walk through the setup in a meeting, that is absolutely fine. I can loop in Ava, our Project Manager, who can get back to you.

Just let me know if that works with you, always happy to help

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hi Team,

G'day, hope you're well.

I'm reaching out to request a virtual meeting to discuss a few updates and possible changes to our website. We'd like to walk through the current setup, share some improvements we have in mind, and get your guidance on next steps.

Could we schedule a session on 4 December?
The following times work for us:

  • 11:00 a.m. - 12:00 p.m., or

  • 2:00 p.m. - 3:00 p.m.

Participants will include myself and Roman (roman@martia.com.au).

Please let me know which time suits you best, and feel free to send through a calendar invite.

Thank you and looking forward to connecting.




Regards,

Samantha

www.balancemybooks.com.au

(t) 1300 319 000 (e) Samantha@balancemybooks.com.au

(a) Level 14, 3 Parramatta Square, 153 Macquarie Street Parramatta NSW 2150

Referrals are a crucial part of our business. If you, your friends, family members, or work colleagues are in need of our comprehensive range of business services, please don't hesitate to contact us. We would be grateful for the opportunity to assist you.

To learn more about our services and how we can help, please visit our website at www.balancemybooks.com.au. We also have a referral partner program that allows you to earn rewards for any successful referrals you make. If you're interested in joining our program, please email us, and we'll set you up. Thank you for your support.
